  index: "restaurants",
  retriever: {
    rrf: {
      retrievers: [
        {
          standard: {
            query: {
              multi_match: {
                query: "Austria",
                fields: ["city", "region"],
              },
            },
          },
        },
        {
          knn: {
            field: "vector",
            query_vector: [10, 22, 77],
            k: 10,
            num_candidates: 10,
          },
        },
      ],
      rank_constant: 1,
      rank_window_size: 50,
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
